name: Travildorn
description:
The streets are covered with darkness, through the flashlight you notice a whole horde of zombies!
You have to shoot, run, survive...
And now there are more than rules of the tramp:
- Run... Don't ever stop!
- Shoot only on these creatures, cartridges are not endless!
-They climb from every crack, constantly look around...
Remember this... And always use it in the game...

5 reasons why you should play this game:
-earn money
-pump up your abilities to become more powerful!
-the whole bloodthirst pour from every zombie...
-there's nothing boring!

3 reasons why you shouldn't play this game:
-The whole sea of ​​mash and screaming moments
-Too much blood, can affect the psyche!
-You're 12 years old
